successes.title: DreadBall Xtreme - The Brutal Sci-fi Sports Board Game
successes.description: More violence, intimidating sponsors and all-new teams, Xtreme is a whole new way of playing Dreadball - The Futuristic Sports Game!

Pledges.description: THANK YOU FOR BACKING! This reward level is perfect if you just want to pledge for add-ons and not the whole game. Pledges over $25 include free shipping to UK and US. Please see main page for international shipping.
THANK YOU FOR BACKING! We will send you a digital copy of the rulebook.
Expand your DreadBall experience with a Soft Cover DreadBall Season 4 Rulebook! Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Pick a DreadBall Xtreme Team of your choice and get a digital copy of the Xtreme Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.
Get the DreadBall Xtreme Boxed Game and a digital copy of the Xtreme Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Get the DreadBall Xtreme Boxed Game, the Kickstarter Exclusive Ardia Shi’lek Sponsor model and a digital copy of the Xtreme Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals. Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Get the DreadBall Xtreme Boxed Game, Xtreme Sponsors Set, the DreadBall Player Manual, Xtreme Multiplayer Expansion including Customisable Pitch, as well as the Kickstarter Exclusive Ardia Shi’lek Sponsor model and a digital copy of the Xtreme Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals! Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Get the DreadBall Xtreme Boxed Game, Xtreme Sponsors Set, the DreadBall Player Manual, Xtreme Multiplayer Expansion including Customisable Pitch, as well as the Kickstarter Exclusive Ardia Shi’lek Sponsor model and a digital copy of the Xtreme Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals! Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Get the DreadBall Xtreme Boxed Game, Xtreme Sponsors Set, the DreadBall Player Manual, Xtreme Multiplayer Expansion including Customisable Pitch, as well as the Kickstarter Exclusive Ardia Shi’lek Sponsor model and a digital copy of the Xtreme Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals! Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

Original DreadBall + the DreadBall Xtreme Boxed Game, Xtreme Sponsors Set, the DreadBall Player Manual, Xtreme Multiplayer Expansion including Customisable Pitch, as well as the Kickstarter Exclusive Ardia Shi’lek Sponsor model and a digital copy of the Xtreme Rulebook PLUS any applicable Stretch Goals! Includes UK and US Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.

This is the level if you want to get everything there is for the game, including all of the Stretch Goal Rewards and a number of Add-Ons as they Unlock! Start with the DreadBall Xtreme Boxed Game, Xtreme Sponsors Set, the DreadBall Player Manual, Xtreme Multiplayer Expansion including Customisable Pitch, as well as the Kickstarter Exclusive Ardia Shi’lek Sponsor model and a digital copy of the Xtreme Rulebook PLUS all applicable Stretch Goals! Includes UK and US Courier Shipping. Please see main page for international shipping rates.
